vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Allon = "great tree" or "oak"
This name is used for:
1) city in Naphtali
2) a Simeonite
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (2)   hijo de Jedaías; tribu de Simeón
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞龍 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "大樹" 或 "橡樹"
一個西緬人 (代上 4:37)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚龙 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "大树" 或 "橡树"
一个西缅人 (代上 4:37)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Simeon(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.37;
son of: Jedaiah (H3042);
father of: Shiphi (H8230)
§ Allon = "great tree" or "oak"
1) city in Naphtali
2) a Simeonite
